pullRequest.title: feat(broker): use FEEL for conditions on sequence flows
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

replace the existing condition language with FEEL to uniform the expression languages
conditions can be used on sequence flows that are attached to an exclusive gateway
remove msgpack-el module

Related issues
closes #3805
Pull Request Checklist

 All commit messages match our commit message guidelines
 The submitting code follows our code style
 If submitting code, please run mvn clean install -DskipTests locally before committing

nodes.bodyText: What if the condition is foo? Is it a valid condition expression?

commit.message:
feat(broker): use FEEL for conditions on sequence flows

* replace the existing condition language with FEEL to uniform the expression languages
* conditions can be used on sequence flows that are attached to an exclusive gateway
* remove msgpack-el module

afterCommit.message:
